value.title: How Fidelity Investments enabled Azure at scale for their developers | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Maintaining an elevated level of security and governance in regulated industries like financial services can introduce complexity and friction. Geoff Langfield from Fidelity Investments (https://www.fidelity.com) joins Scott Hanselman to show how they're eliminating this friction by using automation

value.title: How the Azure Cloud Shell uses storage | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, we'll demystify storage in the Azure Cloud Shell.
